name: The Fisherman's Wife Knit Neck Warmer
description:
**** Sale priced ~ Was $50 ****

Weather the storm with this feminine version of the Fisherman’s Wool sweater.

Plush and warm, this is the perfect accessory for the cold, harsh winter months.

Wear over a sleek black turtleneck or under a classic navy peacoat.

Knit with a soft and warm Wool/Nylon in the classic shade of Fisherman's Wool White.

Embellished with three large (1.25") Faux Leather buttons.

Warmer measures 28" end to end(unbuttoned) by 6" wide and stretches for even more room. 

Your neck warmer will be hand knit especially for YOU, within 7 days of receipt of purchase.

Mailed via First Class mail.

name: Through the Woods Knit Hooded Neck Warmer
description:
**** Sale priced ~ Was $125 ****

Gather warmth on your journey over the mountains.
And Through the Woods....

This whimsical accessory will ward off the harsh winter cold
while keeping you safely disguised from the lurking dangers of the wild woods.

Perfect for your long walk to Grandmother's house with your picnic basket in tow.

Hand Knit in a warm durable Peruvian Wool.

Color Pictured :: Big Bad Wolf (light charcoal grey)

Features (5) Natural wood buttons.

Warmer buttons off and on. You can wear the hood up or down!

This hood is hand knit by request. Please allow up to 2 weeks for completion of garment. Thank you!

name: Through the Woods... Knit Pattern
description:
THIS LISTING IS FOR THE PATTERN TO KNIT YOUR OWN HOODED NECK WARMER NOT FOR THE ACTUAL WARMER

Please give your email address in the Special Instructions box at Paypal checkout. Pdf will be emailed to your specified email address within 24 hrs of payment. 
 

Gather warmth on your journey over the mountains.
And Through the Woods....
This whimsical accessory will ward off the harsh winter cold
while keeping you safely disguised from the lurking dangers of the wild woods. Perfect for your long walk to Grandmother's house with your picnic basket in tow.

Pattern requires approx. 300 yards of "Bulky" weight yarn.
You can also use double strands of "Worsted" weight yarn.

Knit Level: Intermediate

PDF File size: 1.6 MB

This pattern, as well as all of my patterns, is copywritten by myself, Kalurah Hudson, Whiletheyplay Inc. 2011.

Sorry! No hard copies are available for mailing.

Please do not reproduce my pattern for resale benefit or create items using my pattern for financial gain.

name: Printable Crochet e-Book
description:
All of my CROCHET designs in one convenient PDF. 
Print only the pattern you want or print the entire file and bind in a nice sturdy folder for yourself or to gift to a friend.

A link to the download will be emailed to your specified email address once payment is received within 24 hrs. 
Please give your email address in the Special Instructions box at Paypal checkout.
